ausf.software.util

Class Math

  • java.lang.Object
    • ausf.software.util.Math

  • public class Math
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing implementations of methods for calculating the required quantities, as well as methods for converting data from one type to another.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Shcherbina Daniil
    See Also:
    Audio
